Text: Miles is one of two official mascots of the Denver Broncos, an American football team in the National Football League (NFL).

Text: Miles (mascot):  Team NFL Heroes were a line of mascot-like characters created by NFL Properties; most of the characters only lasted a season or two but a handful ended up being adopted as official mascots by their respective teams, either immediately after the Team NFL Heroes project was canceled or years later with Miles being an example of the latter.
